categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic

nodes.text: Cazzush was a male criminal during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. His gang kidnapped the Twi'lek doctor Prudy on the planet Alderaan after her former fiancé Archiban Kimble (commonly known as Doc) did not deliver the spice that the gang had paid him to.

Cazzush was originally slated to appear in the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in "The Best Intentions," a mission for the Jedi Knight class' companion character Doc, but he was cut before the game's release. The player would have accompanied Doc to Alderaan in order to rescue Prudy, and although the game's conversation files still contain the text for the mission, by the time of the game's release it had been edited so that Doc goes to Alderaan alone but also helps Republic Customs capture the gang in the process.
